pandas-mcp.description: Custom pandas MCP server with 20+ data science tools

MCP_DOCKER.description: Docker MCP Toolkit - Access all installed MCP servers (GitHub, Playwright, etc.)
MCP_DOCKER.note: Enable in Docker Desktop: Settings → Beta features → Enable Docker MCP Toolkit, then install servers from Catalog

jupyter-mcp.description: Jupyter MCP Server - Persistent notebook execution (400+ tools)
jupyter-mcp.note: Connected to running Jupyter Lab at http://localhost:8888
